channel.title: 注解 on 云端奈何卿的博客
channel.description: Recent content in 注解 on 云端奈何卿的博客

item.title: Swagger2注解
item.description: Swagger使用@ApiParam注解需要和@RequertParam注解一起使用 @RequestMapping(value = “/getUserById.html”,method = RequestMethod.GET) @ApiOperation(notes = “获取单个用户信息”,value = “getUserById”,protocols = “http”,response = User.class,produces = “text/html”) public String getUser(@ApiParam(value = “主键”,name = “id”,defaultValue = “1”,required = true)@RequestParam Long id) { System.out.println("id = " + id); return userService.queryUserById(id).toString(); }
